title: Fury Road Diana
body:
I did this concept a while ago...

http://i.imgur.com/YRmhMVo.jpg[/img]

here is the original post 
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/oeVEz5Nb-fury-road-diana

And well I had some free time and decided to work a little more on it.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/xQWX3E2.jpg[/img]

So I went to photoshop and did a "better scribble" XD

I think this theme really works for diana....she is a warrior, an assassin, her voice over is kinda dark so yeah.
Mad Max is a world of fire and blood.

Her passive could be red with some fire particles
So her Q could be some fire arc....and the moonlight is red.
Her W smalls skulls bombs that explodes....her shield should be red.
Her E could be like her passive but a bigger scale.
And her ulti could leave a fire track.

Thanks for reading and the comments! <3

and...WITNESS MY TRUTH!
-she should says that when she ult-

replies.body: Oh, what a skin!  What a lovely skin!

Great concept! Especially like the first sketch. Diana is a perfect candidate. Would be good to see an entire Fury Road skin line imo:
{{champion:92}} {{champion:254}} {{champion:245}}{{champion:6}} could definitely fit. 
{{champion:201}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:62}}{{champion:29}} are some more unique ones that i think might work as well.

of all these champs, YOU DIDNT FUCKING INCLUDE {{champion:104}} .
YOU HAD ONE JOB. ONE. JOB.

MAD GRAVES COME ON!!!
